price: Na nini kitakacho kujuulisha Siku ya Malipo ni siku gani?
footnotes: Na nini kitakujuvya ni nini hiyo Siku ya Malipo, na mambo yake yamepindukia ujuzi wako na fikra zako?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
